text: Teuma di gata tameuhoi jihnyan Tameudong sinan pat nyang peurintah Bek tapeuturot napsu awaknyan Di lon meuiman meunan tapeugah Di lon keu kitab ka lon meuiman Nyang ka Neupeutron keunoe le Allah Neuyue beu ade di lon keu gata Allah TaÊ»ala meunan Neupeugah Tuhan Po kamoe deungon Po gata Kamoe keurija ban nyang peurintah Teuma di kamoe ban amai kamoe Ka Neuyue kamoe meunan le Allah Di gata teuma ban amai gata Hana le dawa tanyoe meubantah Geutanyoe bandum Tuhan peusapat Tawoe dum meuhat keudeh bak Allah
